mapper.select: SELECT userchat_idx, user_id, userchat_subject, userchat_date, userchat_state, current_people, max_people, notice FROM userchat WHERE userchat_state = 1 ORDER BY userchat_date DESC

SELECT uc.userchat_idx, uc.user_id, uc.userchat_subject, DATE_FORMAT(uc.userchat_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS userchat_date, uc.userchat_state, uc.current_people, uc.max_people, uc.notice, u.user_photo, u.user_nickname FROM userchat uc JOIN user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id WHERE uc.userchat_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') AND uc.userchat_state = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userchat(user_id, userchat_subject, current_people, max_people) SELECT #{user_id}, #{userchat_subject}, 1, #{max_people} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM userchat WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND userchat_state = 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT uc.userchat_idx, uc.user_id, uc.userchat_subject, uc.current_people, uc.max_people FROM userchat uc WHERE uc.userchat_state = 1 AND uc.userchat_idx IN ( SELECT p.chatroom_idx AS userchat_idx FROM parti p WHERE p.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.parti_state = 1 AND p.chatroom_category = 'userchat' )
